main event: One object, generally white with a reddish tint, was observed to drift to the south for approximately 50 minutes.
interesting points: The object was reportedly silent with no visible vapor trail or exhaust,The sighting lasted for about 50 minutes,The object was described as generally white with a reddish tint,Records indicated that a weather balloon was aloft at the designated time,The sighting was investigated by AISS and connected with local weather conditions.
witness description: A civilian who observed the object while driving.
